entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
